ticket.title: PostgreSQL: update rake tasks to use full settings from database.yml - bugfix
ticket.original-body:
After http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/c26d10563eaa29961ae895a9fbe3afae7d24a9b1 commit in db:test:purge, drop_database on configuration with schema_search_path broken: rake aborted! PGError: ERROR: schema “my_schema” does not exist : SET search_path TO my_schema
When we connect to 'template1' database only for delete *_test database, we do not have there "my_schema".
In patch we do not apply schema if database is default 'template1'.
